title: Prob Theory for Sci/Eng
description: Classical introduction to probability theory including expectation, notions of convergence, laws of large numbers, independence, large deviations, conditional expectation, martingales, and Markov chains.

prerequisites: MATH 4221 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
